description: The CreateWorkerBlock operation allows you to prevent a Worker from working on your HITs. For example, you can block a Worker who is producing poor quality work. You can block up to 100,000 Workers.

parameters.name: WorkerId
parameters.description: The ID of the Worker to block.

parameters.name: Reason
parameters.description: A message explaining the reason for blocking the Worker. This parameter enables you to keep track of your Workers. The Worker does not see this message.
